branding.tagline: Your Guide to a Self-Sufficient Life

publishing_focus.target_audience: People interested in homesteading, self-sufficiency, and living off the land.
publishing_focus.competitive_advantage: Our focus on practical homesteading techniques and self-sufficiency sets us apart in the agricultural publishing sector.
publishing_focus.example_titles: Titles like 'Homesteading Handbook', 'The Self-Sufficient Life', or authors like Laura Ingalls Wilder.
